author: aloeliger
body:
Original PR: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9709

As stated in the original PR:

> Updates externals to have CICADA 2.2.0 model (CICADA repository version 1.4.0)

This is being backported to support PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47559
title: [15_0] Update CICADA.spec to 1.4.0
